name: I PROMISE TO FAIL | object #6 : giragira | Playground
description: Wrapped up object with  the Brazilian cleaning tissue: Perfex. The concept of the work is based on the expectation of failure. The marketing promoted by the cleaning product promises perfection, absolute cleanliness and high-performance. However, its imminent failure is questioned as soon as its acetic superficiality comes into contact with its use. | video, 22` | 1080 x 1080 px | Twitter @erica__storer
